channel.title: CVE Feed for duoFAQ - Responsive, Flat, Simple FAQ -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for duoFAQ - Responsive, Flat, Simple FAQ -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-39319|2024-08-04T02:06:41.560Z -- duofaq%20-%20responsive%2C%20flat%2C%20simple%20faq -- duofaq%20-%20responsive%2C%20flat%2C%20simple%20faq
item.description: The duoFAQ - Responsive, Flat, Simple FAQ WordPess plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the msg parameter found in the ~/duogeek/duogeek-panel.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.4.8.
